description: Send if an AlarmEvent occurs
Index is nodeAlarmNo
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::mAlarmTrap MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeTrapNo i 9999 MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeAlarmNo i 9999 MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeOMCIndex i 9999 MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeOMCPrefix s EXAMPLE MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeRepDN s EXAMPLE MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeRepeaterID s EXAMPLE MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeRaiseTime s EXAMPLE MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodePerceivedSeveritie i 0 MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeEventType i 9999 MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeProbableCause i 0 MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeSpecificProblem s EXAMPLE MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeAdditionalText s EXAMPLE MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeTrendIndication i 9999 MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeWorstCase i 9999

description: Trap No. (i=i+1 in Runtime, Resetted by Restart or mRestart)
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeTrapNo

description: Alarm No. (i=i+1 in Runtime, Resetted by Restart or mRestart)
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeAlarmNo

description: OMC Index for this Alarm: Unique for each Alarm, (Constant by restart)
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeOMCIndex

description: Simillar to mOMCPrefix
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeOMCPrefix

description: Distinguished Name of the Repeater stored in the OMC
Beware:
If a Repeater has no Distinguished Name,
Alarms and Alarm Clear Messages are not forwarded.
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeRepDN

description: Includes the RepeaterID used in the OMC
Format: MR: ID (stored to the OMC and to the Repeater)
MOR: ID+SPACE+SlaveNo. (Messages referring to the Master or Slaves)
ID (Messages referring to the complete System)
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeRepeaterID

description: X733 Time Stamp from OMC by creating this Alarm in MIKOM Standard
Format: YYYY-MM-DD,HH:MM:SS
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeRaiseTime

description: X733 Severitie of this Alarm in numeric MIKOM Standard
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodePerceivedSeveritie

description: X733 EventType of this Alarm in numeric MIKOM Standard
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeEventType

description: X733 ProbableCause of this Alarm in numeric MIKOM Standard
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeProbableCause

description: X733 Alarm Translation into a MIKOM Standard Format
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeSpecificProblem

description: X733 Additional Text Line from the OMC- Keyword Table
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeAdditionalText

description: X733 TrendIndication in numeric MIKOM Standard
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeTrendIndication

description: X733 WorstCase in numeric MIKOM Standard
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeWorstCase

description: Send if an AlarmClearEvent occurs
Index is nodeAlarmNo
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::mAlarmClearTrap MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeTrapNo i 9999 MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeAlarmNo i 9999 MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeOMCIndex i 9999 MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeOMCPrefix s EXAMPLE MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeRepDN s EXAMPLE MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeRepeaterID s EXAMPLE MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeClearTime s EXAMPLE MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodePerceivedSeveritie i 0 MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeEventType i 9999 MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeProbableCause i 0 MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeSpecificProblem s EXAMPLE MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeAdditionalText s EXAMPLE MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeClearMessage i 9999

description: Trap No. (i=i+1 in Runtime, Resetted by Restart or mRestart)
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeTrapNo

description: Alarm No. (i=i+1 in Runtime, Resetted by Restart or mRestart)
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeAlarmNo

description: OMC Index for this Alarm: Unique for each Alarm, (Constant by restart)
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeOMCIndex

description: Simillar to mOMCPrefix
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeOMCPrefix

description: Distinguished Name of the Repeater stored in the OMC
Beware:
If a Repeater has no Distinguished Name,
Alarms and Alarm Clear Messages are not forwarded.
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeRepDN

description: Includes the RepeaterID used in the OMC
Format: MR: ID (stored to the OMC and to the Repeater)
MOR: ID+SPACE+SlaveNo. (Messages referring to the Master or Slaves)
ID (Messages referring to the complete System)
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeRepeaterID

description: X733 Time Stamp from OMC by clearing this Alarm in MIKOM Standard
Format: YYYY-MM-DD,HH:MM:SS
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeClearTime

description: X733 Severitie of this Alarm in numeric MIKOM Standard
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodePerceivedSeveritie

description: X733 EventType of this Alarm in numeric MIKOM Standard
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeEventType

description: X733 ProbableCause of this Alarm in numeric MIKOM Standard
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeProbableCause

description: X733 Alarm Translation into a MIKOM Standard Format
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeSpecificProblem

description: X733 Additional Text Line from the OMC- Keyword Table
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeAdditionalText

description: X733 ClearMessage in numeric MIKOM Standard
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeClearMessage

description: Send by Startup or Reset via mRestart
nodeAlarmNo (Index) is always 0
Trap No. (i=i+1 in Runtime, Resetted by Restart or mRestart)
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeTrapNo

description: OMC Index for this Alarm: Unique for each Alarm, (Constant by restart)
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeOMCIndex

description: X733 Time Stamp from OMC by creating this Alarm in MIKOM Standard
Format: YYYY-MM-DD,HH:MM:SS
variables.name: MIKOM-OMC-Alarmforwarding-MIB::nodeRaiseTime
